# Site { #flood_adapt.Site }

```python
Site()
```

The expected variables and data types of attributes of the Site class.

## Attributes {.doc-section .doc-section-attributes}

<code>[**name**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[str](`str`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   Name of the site.

<code>[**description**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[str](`str`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   Description of the site. Defaults to "".

<code>[**lat**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[float](`float`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   Latitude of the site.

<code>[**lon**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[float](`float`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   Longitude of the site.

<code>[**standard_objects**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [StandardObjectModel, default=StandardObjectModel()]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   Standard objects of the site.

<code>[**gui**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[GuiModel](`flood_adapt.config.gui.GuiModel`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   GUI model of the site.

<code>[**sfincs**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[SfincsModel](`flood_adapt.config.sfincs.SfincsModel`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   SFincs model of the site.

<code>[**fiat**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[FiatModel](`flood_adapt.config.fiat.FiatModel`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   Fiat model of the site.

## Methods

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [load_file](#flood_adapt.Site.load_file) | Create Site from toml file. |
| [save](#flood_adapt.Site.save) | Write toml file from model object. |

### load_file { #flood_adapt.Site.load_file }

```python
Site.load_file(filepath: Union[str, os.PathLike])
```

Create Site from toml file.

### save { #flood_adapt.Site.save }

```python
Site.save(
    filepath: Union[str, os.PathLike],
    sfincs: str = 'sfincs.toml',
    fiat: str = 'fiat.toml',
    gui: str = 'gui.toml',
)
```

Write toml file from model object.
